alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier; Northern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Glacier County through 300 PM MDT... At 230 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 28 miles northwest of Cut Bank to 9 miles north of North Browning. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Glacier County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for north central Montana.
